description: A terminal music player written in Rust that uses vim-like key bindings. See also: cmus, ncmpcpp, audacious. More information: https://github.com/tramhao/termusic.

useCases.description: Open termusic to a specific directory. (It can be set permanently in ~/.config/termusic/config.toml):
